description: The granular-marking type defines how the list of marking-definition objects referenced by the marking_refs property to apply to a set of content identified by the list of selectors in the selectors property.
title: granular-marking

___selectors.description: A list of selectors for content contained within the STIX object in which this property appears.

___lang.description: Identifies the language of the text identified by this marking.

$eref.description: Represents identifiers across the CTI specifications. The format consists of the name of the top-level object being identified, followed by two dashes (--), followed by a UUIDv4.
$eref.title: identifier

allOf.description: The marking_ref property specifies the ID of the marking-definition object that describes the marking.
